name: Burger Burglars
description:
Collect fries and baguettes through a constantly changing maze to defeat the Burger and steal the secret recipe.

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Click on a monster from a distance to throw fries at them, or click from right next to it to use the baguettes.

Don't be afraid to die as each time you die you get an opportunity to change the map, and the future. Go into the newly added rooms to find fries and baguettes, but beware of spiders.
